comments.author: Werner
comments.body: Twitter has been down all morning since Steve announced his Twitter feed. Coincidence? I think not...

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: @markw, Yeah, I wonder if the heavy-duty Frenzy traffic has bogged down their servers. Time for them to inject some of that [$35m](http://tinyurl.com/bk3bgf) into new servers, huh?

comments.author: iSean
comments.body: RE: load times after the RSS feed. I haven't noticed anything myself, but I don't routinely hold a timer up to websites. I figure that if it's faster than CULink, it's fast enough. Unless more people start to use it, then I could see it getting moved to another area, like the Bios page. I'll likely continue to use it, mostly because it's a good motivation to get out there and do something (even if it's not a technically a Frenz ride)
